titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to Aroostook State Teacher College Catalogs, etc. Cubb.00103
titlestmt.author: Kathy Kerns

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2018-05-16 10:09:43 -0700.

did.unittitle: Aroostook State Teacher College (later University of Maine at Presque Isle; formerly Aroostook State Normal School)
did.abstract: Located in Presque Isle, Maine. Founded in 1903 as Aroostook State Normal School. Became Aroostook State Teachers College in 1952. Other name changes are: Aroostook State College (1965); Aroostook State College of the University of Maine (1968); and University of Maine at Presque Isle (1971).

physdesc.extent:
Catalogs for 1909/10, 1911/12, 1913/14-1914/15, 1922/23
Bulletin for 1938/39
Circular of Information for 1936/37

Typescript information on: Academic admissions policies How to apply List of administration & faculty Four-Year Elementary Teacher Education Program Proposed Curriculum in Health, Physical Education and Recreation Expenses and Schedule of Payments Financial Assistance Program Guidance talk on "Teaching as a Profession"
